content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Certainly, Miss Smith. I have taken the liberty of calculating the rental price of the apartment based on current market rates and the size of the apartment. I believe that a monthly rental price of 700 Euros would be a fair and competitive rate for this apartment. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate with you. Can you give me some room to negotiate?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Of course, Miss Smith. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Please feel free to make an offer and we can see if we can come to an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 650 Euros per month for the apartment.

Mister Heine, I would like to negotiate with you. Can you give me some room to negotiate?

I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Therefore, I negotiate with the landlord at the apartment.

Please consider my offer of 650 Euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price based on the size of the apartment and current market rates.

I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Therefore, I hope you will consider my offer.

If you are unwilling to accept my offer, I will have to look for other options.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Understood, Miss Smith. Thank you for your offer of 650 Euros per month for the apartment. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must inform you that I am unable to accept your offer at this time. The apartment is in high demand and I believe that the market rate of 700 Euros per month is a fair and reasonable price for the size and location of the apartment. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and wish you the best of luck in your search for a suitable rental property.
name: Heinrich Heine
